All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthenticationService
Service class for handling authentication-related operations.
EmailServiceClient
A service client for sending match reminder emails via an external email service.
Glicko2RatingService
Interface for Glicko2RatingService.
Glicko2RatingServiceImpl
This service class implements the Glicko-2 rating system to calculate new player ratings after a match.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for handling exceptions across the entire application.
JwtRequestFilter
JwtRequestFilter is a custom filter that processes JWT authentication.
JwtUtil
Utility class for handling JWT (JSON Web Token) operations such as token creation, validation, and extraction of claims.
Match
Represents a match within a tournament, containing details such as participants, scheduled time, status, and round number.
Match.MatchStatus
Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a match.
MatchController
Controller for managing match-related operations in the chess tournament system.
MatchDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing match information in a tournament.
MatchmakingDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing the matchmaking information in a tournament.
MatchmakingService
MatchmakingService is an interface that defines the contract for implementing matchmaking functionality in a chess tournament system.
MatchmakingServiceImpl
Implementation of the MatchmakingService interface that handles the matchmaking process for chess tournaments.
MatchMapper
Utility class for converting Match entities to MatchDTOs.
MatchNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where a match is not found.
MatchPlayer
Entity representing a match player in a chess tournament.
MatchPlayer.Result
Enum representing the possible outcomes of a match.
MatchPlayerRepository
Repository interface for MatchPlayer entity.
MatchRepository
Repository interface for Match entity.
MatchResultDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing the result of a chess match.
MatchResultService
Service interface for handling the completion of matches in the chess tournament.
MatchResultServiceImpl
Implementation of the MatchResultService interface.
MatchService
Service interface for handling match-related operations in the chess application.
MatchServiceApplication
 
MatchServiceGlicko2Test
 
MatchServiceImpl
Service implementation for match-related operations in the chess application.
MatchTimeService
Service interface for handling operations related to match time updates.
MatchTimeServiceImpl
Implementation of the MatchTimeService interface.
PlayerNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where a player is not found.
PlayerRatingUpdateDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for updating a player's rating information.
PlayerServiceClient
Client for interacting with the Player service to update player profile ratings.
ReminderEmailDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for holding match reminder email details.
SecurityConfig
Security configuration class for the application.
TimeControlSettingDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing the time control settings for a chess game or tournament.
TournamentDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a tournament.
TournamentFinalisationService
Service interface for finalizing a tournament.
TournamentFinalisationServiceImpl
Implementation of the TournamentFinalisationService interface.
TournamentNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where a tournament is not found.
TournamentPlayerDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a player in a tournament.
TournamentResultsDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) to encapsulate the results of a tournament.
TournamentResultsDTO.PlayerResultDTO
Nested Data Transfer Object (DTO) to represent an individual player's result.
TournamentRoundNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where a tournament round is not found.
TournamentServiceClient
Client for fetching tournament details from an external Tournament service.
UnauthorizedActionException
Custom exception class for unauthorized actions in the application.
UpdateMatchTimeDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for updating the scheduled time of a match.
UserDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a user.
